cause.description:
We have created an endowment at the MD Anderson Cancer Center (the hospital in Houston where Oliver was treated). This fund will go on indefinitely, withe the interest each year supports colon cancer research.
1. Every cancer patient deserves hope.
2. With our show of support, we can help give hope to those in need.
cause.mission: Support colon cancer research to make a difference in the lives of cancer patients like Oliver.
cause.name: Oliver Vincent Cruz Memorial Fund
